programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if real audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o phasor.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
ifn = 1 ;read table 1 with our index ixmode = 1 kndx phasor p4 kfrq table kndx, ifn, ixmode asig poscil .6, kfrq, 2 ;re-synthesize with sine outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f 1 0 1025 -7 200 1024 2000 ;a line from 200 to 2,000 f 2 0 16384 10 1;sine wave
i 1 0 1 1 ;once per second i 1 2 2 .5 ;once per 2 seconds i 1 5 1 2 ;twice per second e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
